comments:
Build id: 200403261517 (M8)

- started eclipse with fresh workspace
- checked out and built several projects from cvs
- ran once with -noupdate on the command line
- exiting and closed all projects
- tried to run again; got an error about missing build.xml file (see *).
- opened all projects again
- tried to run again
- got NPE (see **)

Maybe this is just because I used -noupdate?  I'm using it to try to reproduce 
bug 47054; I don't really know what its supposed to do.

-----------------------------------
(*) error #1; not significant to me (I'm not sure what -noupdate does, but it 
looks like I should not have tried running with it)

    Unknown argument: -noupdate
    Buildfile: C:\eclipse\m8\eclipse\build.xml

    BUILD FAILED
    Buildfile: C:\eclipse\m8\eclipse\build.xml does not exist

    Total time: 0 seconds


-----------------------------------
(**) error #2; looks serious
